database.name: creators_dev_db
database.version: PostgreSQL 17.4 on x86_64-windows, compiled by msvc-19.43.34808, 64-bit

rootCauses.description: Migration file was modified after being executed
rootCauses.impact: Schema drift - database state does not match migration file

rootCauses.description: Some migration files exist but were never executed
rootCauses.impact: Schema is incomplete, missing tables/columns from these migrations

rootCauses.description: Migrations were executed in different order than file names suggest
rootCauses.impact: May cause dependency issues if migrations depend on each other

rootCauses.description: Core tables migration 0001_core_tables_idempotent.sql was never executed
rootCauses.impact: Core tables (users, projects, content, etc.) may not exist

recommendations.action: Execute all pending migrations in correct order
Investigate modified migrations and create corrective migrations
